content: I like those tips, thanks. One thing I've been doing is taking an extra-long walk during my lunch break, which really helps me reach my daily goal of 10,000 steps. Speaking of which, I need to replace the band on my Fitbit soon - the original one has started to fray and I'm worried it's going to break soon. Do you know where I can find replacement bands for my Fitbit Charge 4?
